#summary A quick introduction to SANE Evolution
#labels Featured

SANE Evolution is a fork of the SANE project. It aims to produce an [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Evolution evolved] version of SANE by adding features and small improvements while keeping compatibility. 

The fork began in march 2008 . You can read about features and [Why reasons] in the
wiki. A quick description of the new features is [NewFeatures here].

Developers and advanced users are encouraged to test SANE Evolution
right now, using [CompatibleFrontends]. We expect to release SANE Evolution
for the general public in mid april.
